Hi, I'm Satchel. I'm an engineering graduate student living Toronto, Canada. Currently I'm focusing on software development, and reinforcement machine learning. This blog serves a a repository for my exploration of technology, ranging from quick hacks and handy electronics to long term projects.

Under my articles section I write about interesting tidbits of technology, personal opinion or other things that are going on in my life. I'm always working on something new, and always share my build logs on the projects page. If you're interested in speaking with me, feel free to send me an email!
